channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Epstein survivors may release unofficial client list if Justice Department stalls

item.title: Appeals court blocks Trump from deporting Venezuelans under Alien Enemies Act
item.description: The Trump administration can't use a centuries-old wartime law to quickly deport Venezuelans it alleges are suspected gang members, a federal appeals ...

item.title: MTG could use constitutional rule to out Epstein clients: "I'll say every damn name"
item.description: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-Ga.) suggested on Wednesday that she's willing to take advantage of a constitutional immunity rule to reveal sex offend...

item.title: Department stores aren't dead yet: Macy's and Kohl's stocks rebound

item.title: Trump's Harvard funding freeze struck down by federal judge
item.description: A federal judge ruled Wednesday that the Trump administration illegally froze more than $2 billion in federal grants to Harvard . The big picture: The...

item.title: House Republicans form new subcommittee to probe Jan. 6
item.description: Lawmakers slipped a resolution into a rule on the House floor that would establish the controversial subcommittee.

item.title: Trump floats sending law enforcement to New Orleans, in a friendlier state
item.description: The president signaled interest in sending resources to cities where he’ll face less resistance from state authorities.

item.title: Epstein accusers join lawmakers to push for full release of documents
item.description: Not since a 2019 court hearing after Jeffrey Epstein’s death have so many of his accusers gathered and told their stories.

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
